title: Didoni(ish)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905123925im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_help_5850.jpg)

Hi,

Brand new to the site so be nice!  
Looking to find this or similar font. Looks to have Didoni influences but def different. Any help would be great.

Thanks
